text: 27.63: Mt 12.40; 16.21; 17.23; 20.19; Mk 8.31; 9.31; 10.33-34; Ru 9.22; 18.31-33; Zo 2.19-21Mbe vov Pairat garav khaŋ ana nzuai, “Guman rum, nza mba bigi guiguigi guma, ana fhum ŋam kav suaŋgi buna mueŋ, nza ne ndɨrgap ndu han zi. Ana fhum khaŋ suaŋgi, ‘Ra phuni khegene vhɨzgirga, gu taagip khavgirga.’
